acceptTransfer(uint256).notice: Accept a pending transfer. Only recipient can accept.

createToken(string,uint256,string,uint25.notice: Create a token. Only Approved users. Consumers cannot create.

getTokenBalance(uint256,address).notice: Balance of an address for a given token.

getTokenView(uint256).notice: Read-only view of a token (Token has a mapping so we expose a view tuple).

getTransfer(uint256).notice: Returns transfer data as a tuple.

rejectTransfer(uint256).notice: Reject a pending transfer. Only recipient can reject.

transfer(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Create a pending transfer and reserve sender balance until accept/reject.
